name: KeybindsGalore Plus
description: Adds a popup pie menu when a key with conflicting bindings is pressed. A fork of KeybindsGalore, originally by Cael and updated to 1.20 by HVB007
contributors: Alwis2000 -- flagging yet another Java incompatibility mistake
GuardedHoney53 -- managing to trigger the setPressed method I thought never happened
